wikipedia_page.main: Kelvin Gladstone Peter Hendrie (2 July 1898 – December 1953) was a Scottish international rugby union player, who played for Scotland and the Lions.He played at No. 8 for Heriot's FP. He was capped for Scotland three times and was on the 1924 British Lions tour to South Africa, where he played in one test.

response: *Kelvin Hendrie (1898–1953), Scottish international rugby union player
